DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_01: A warm welcome to all of you. I invited you here because you are known for your hunting skills and cunning.
DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_02: You probably know the story about the terrible beast that lives in the area around Silbach and frightens the inhabitants.
DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_03: Unfortunately, local hunters have proven highly unsuccessful in their attempts to hunt it down.
DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_04: So I decided to change my approach to solve the problem once and for all and restore the villagers' peaceful sleep.
DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_05: For the person who returns to me with the monster's head, I have prepared a special prize straight from my personal vault.
DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_06: I won't reveal exactly what it is, but I promise it's worth a small fortune.
DIA_Ramsey_SQ416_Cutscene_03_07: If you're interested, head for Bastian's tavern in Silbach. There you will receive horns for the hunt and at the same time set off on the field so that everyone has an equal chance of victory.
